reviews.name: Fil Lorinc
reviews.comment:
Largely overlooked and seldom patroned. Could use some attention the from city, especially given the proximity to the highly trafficked Dealy Plaza.

Update October 2023: the grounds were cleaned up and a memorial was installed in the fashion of a sun dial.PlaygroundNoneRestroomsNoneDog-friendlinessDoggos welcome :)Picnic areaNone

reviews.name: Gustavo Bermudez
reviews.comment: Nice park, but it has become an area where people have built a camp site. Trash everywhere now.

reviews.name: Kerry Pagano
reviews.comment: This is a great place for families, couples, anyone.
